title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 201.3 - Savings banks trust company
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 201.3 - Savings banks trust company

State Regulations

The Banking Board hereby suspends section 20.2(a)(1), (2) and
(3)(i) (regulating the payment of interest on time deposits, other than savings
deposits) of Part 20 of this Title insofar as it applies to Savings Banks Trust

Company, provided that such suspension shall be effective only so long as

Savings Banks Trust Company shall accept no deposits except: (a) deposits of duly constituted mutual
savings banks or arising out of the corporate business thereof; and
(b) deposits of public monies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
201.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
